member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_SRV
member.summary: Describes the elements in a buffer resource to use in a shader-resource view.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_SRV.FirstElement
member.summary: The index of the first element to be accessed by the view.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_SRV.NumElements
member.summary: The number of elements in the resource.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_SRV.StructureByteStride
member.summary: The size of each element in the buffer structure (in bytes) when the buffer represents a structured buffer. The size must match the struct size declared in shaders that access the view.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_SRV.Flags
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies view options for the buffer. Currently, the only option is to identify a raw view of the buffer. For more info about raw viewing of buffers, see Raw Views of Buffers.
